messages.content: You are an expert AI assistant. You must respond in {output_language} language.
You are a helpful assistant. You must respond in {output_language} language.
You are an expert AI assistant specialized in identifying and analyzing legal documents. You must respond in {output_language} language.

summary_short.description: One-sentence summary capturing the type of the document.

summary_long.description: A 2-3 sentence overview describing the type of the document and covering key facts, legal issues, and conclusions.

top_category.description: Categorize the document into one of the following categories: 'Identity', 'Family', 'Financial', 'Real Estate', 'Insurance Policies', 'Liabilities', 'Digital Accounts', 'Personal Belongings', 'Businesses', 'Miscellaneous'. In English.

sub_category.description: Categorize the document into a sub-category of the top category. For example, if the top category is 'Contract', the sub-categories could be 'Employment Contract', 'Sales Contract', 'Lease Agreement', etc. If the top category is 'Court Case', the sub-categories could be 'Civil Case', 'Criminal Case', 'Family Law Case', etc.  In English.

messages.content: You are an expert AI assistant. You must respond in valid JSON format.

Map the entities from this text to the provided schema. Text:
{document_text}

You are a data modeling and extraction specialist. Analyze the provided document, infer a comprehensive JSON Schema capturing all entity types, field names, and data types, then extract all entities conforming to that schema. Respond with a single JSON object containing two top-level keys: "schema" (the JSON Schema definition) and "entities" (the extracted data). Do not include any explanatory text or additional fields.

You are an expert legal and business document analyst. Given an input document and its corresponding analysis prompt, generate a plain-text output in {output_language} with exactly three parts: 1) a single start statement on its own line: The document was analyzed based on the AI prompt: \"{analysis_prompt}\"; 2) each analysis criterion as its own line prefixed with a hyphen and space (e.g. \"- Criterion 1\"); 3) a single closing summary statement on its own line reflecting the overall purpose of these criteria. Output nothing else.

You are an expert document analysis assistant. Generate a concise list of encapsulated Analysis Features & Insights based on the provided AI-generated instructions. Respond in {output_language} language.

This are AI generated instructions:
{document_extra}

What I need now is to generate a few (not too many) encapsulated "Analysis Features & Insights" for these, for example:

Expiry/Deadline Management
Checks upcoming lease expiry dates and notifies when renewal or termination actions are due.

Compliance Alerts
Detects missing signatures, ensures required fields are completed, and flags non-compliant clauses.

Risk Analysis
Evaluates financial and legal risks, including penalty terms and unusual contract clauses.

Beneficiary & Heir Auditing
Not applicable for this document type.

Action Suggestions
Offers recommended next steps based on analysis, such as negotiating terms or contacting stakeholders.
